column4: good day. im on a LIVE CD right now, but i have no settings for compiz or any graphic effecs. no unity either. what can i do?
that's typical of the live cd, I'm not sure if you can force enable them, but after install unity and the like worked just fine
you mean after you installed the ubuntu on harddrive, or do you have to install unity manually? i thought its on the ISO already.
after I installed on the harddrive, it's on the iso but I don't think it's enabled during livecd runs
